attributes.action: provide integrated not parallel services to Mental Health provision across all Trust areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alcohol and drugs are often used by mental health suffers as a means of controlling their illness. But despite this, there is little recognition of the importance of this fact and dual- diagnosis would insure healthcare at every level. Alcohol abusers are not going to take responsibility for their actions and it is a forlorn hope to assume that they will.
